subject: Re: Question?
author: bulletbabea
full_text:
Yep that can work but I agree with the previous post on pro and con of that method. You can also use your pc microphone and software like audacity to record which is free if you already have a mic. If not they are pretty inexpensive to purchase. You can also experiment with free methods such as evpmaker, sweep tuning a radio, recording white noise, recording silence (ambient noise), running water, and you could modify a radio at little expense to you to make a shack hack or other simulation of a franks box.

Some websites to help you
http://www.stefanbion.de/evpmaker/index_e.htm
http://audacity.sourceforge.net/
http://www.ufogeek.com
http://www.keyportparanormal.com
http://frank.xm.com
http://misty.xm.com

Good Luck!
Misty
